Package com.peyrona.mingle.updater

Class HashCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peyrona.mingle.updater.HashCalculator
  • public final class HashCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for calculating SHA-1 and SHA-256 hashes of files.
    Author:

      • calculateSHA1

        public static java.lang.String calculateSHA1​(java.io.File file)
        Calculates SHA-1 hash of a file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to calculate hash for
        Returns:
        SHA-1 hash as hexadecimal string, or null if error occurs

      • calculateSHA256

        public static java.lang.String calculateSHA256​(java.io.File file)
        Calculates SHA-256 hash of a file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to calculate hash for
        Returns:
        SHA-256 hash as hexadecimal string, or null if error occurs

      • calculateHash

        public static java.lang.String calculateHash​(java.io.File file,
                                             java.lang.String expectedHash)
        Calculates hash of a file using the appropriate algorithm based on expected hash length.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to calculate hash for
        expectedHash - The expected hash to determine algorithm (40 chars = SHA-1, 64 chars = SHA-256)
        Returns:
        Hash as hexadecimal string, or null if error occurs

      • isValidSHA1

        public static boolean isValidSHA1​(java.lang.String hash)
        Validates if a string is a valid SHA-1 hash (40 hexadecimal characters).
        Parameters:
        hash - String to validate
        Returns:
        true if valid SHA-1 hash, false otherwise

      • isValidSHA256

        public static boolean isValidSHA256​(java.lang.String hash)
        Validates if a string is a valid SHA-256 hash (64 hexadecimal characters).
        Parameters:
        hash - String to validate
        Returns:
        true if valid SHA-256 hash, false otherwise
